archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.3.8b: b) configure business applications so that notifications (e.g. email, instant messaging or meeting reminders) are disabled during presentations, screen sharing or when in a public area
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
